languages.text: {n}По обожженному лицу мужчины пробегает судорога.{/n} "Ты не лжешь. Мы оба вкусили {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}чистую агонию{/d} и изменились навсегда. Да, ты — опасный противник".

{n}A tremor runs across the man's burned face.{/n} "You are not lying. We have both tasted {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pure agony{/d} and are forever changed by it. Yes, you are a dangerous opponent."
languages.original_text: {n}По обожженному лицу мужчины пробегает судорога.{/n} "Ты не лжешь. Мы оба вкусили {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}чистую агонию{/d} и изменились навсегда. Да, ты — опасный противник".

traits.locale_text: {n}A tremor runs across the man's burned face.{/n} "You are not lying. We have both tasted {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pure agony{/d} and are forever changed by it. Yes, you are a dangerous opponent."

{n}A tremor runs across the man's burned face.{/n} "You are not lying. We have both tasted {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pure agony{/d} and are forever changed by it. Yes, you are a dangerous opponent."

{n}A tremor runs across the man's burned face.{/n} "You are not lying. We have both tasted {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pure agony{/d} and are forever changed by it. Yes, you are a dangerous opponent."

{n}A tremor runs across the man's burned face.{/n} "You are not lying. We have both tasted {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pure agony{/d} and are forever changed by it. Yes, you are a dangerous opponent."

{n}A tremor runs across the man's burned face.{/n} "You are not lying. We have both tasted {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pure agony{/d} and are forever changed by it. Yes, you are a dangerous opponent."

languages.text: {n}男の焼けただれた顔に震えが走る。{/n}「嘘ではないようだな。俺たちはともに{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}完全な苦痛{/d}を味わい、それによって永遠に変わってしまった。だから、あんたは危険な相手だ」
languages.original_text: {n}A tremor runs across the man's burned face.{/n} "You are not lying. We have both tasted {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pure agony{/d} and are forever changed by it. Yes, you are a dangerous opponent."

traits.locale_text: {n}男の焼けただれた顔に震えが走る。{/n}「嘘ではないようだな。俺たちはともに{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}完全な苦痛{/d}を味わい、それによって永遠に変わってしまった。だから、あんたは危険な相手だ」

languages.text: {n}Ein Zittern läuft über das verbrannte Gesicht des Mannes.{/n} "Ihr lügt nicht. Wir haben beide {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}reine Agonie{/d} gespürt und wurden dadurch für immer verändert. Ja, Ihr seid {mf|ein gefährlicher Gegner|eine gefährliche Gegnerin}."
languages.original_text: {n}A tremor runs across the man's burned face.{/n} "You are not lying. We have both tasted {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pure agony{/d} and are forever changed by it. Yes, you are a dangerous opponent."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein Zittern läuft über das verbrannte Gesicht des Mannes.{/n} "Ihr lügt nicht. Wir haben beide {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}reine Agonie{/d} gespürt und wurden dadurch für immer verändert. Ja, Ihr seid {mf|ein gefährlicher Gegner|eine gefährliche Gegnerin}."

languages.text: {n}Adamın yanık yüzünde bir ürperti geziniyor.{/n} "Yalanın yok. İkimiz de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}saf ızdırabı{/d} tattık ve ebediyen değiştik. Doğru, tehlikeli bir rakipsin."
languages.original_text: {n}A tremor runs across the man's burned face.{/n} "You are not lying. We have both tasted {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pure agony{/d} and are forever changed by it. Yes, you are a dangerous opponent."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adamın yanık yüzünde bir ürperti gezinir.{/n} "Yalanın yok. İkimiz de {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}saf ızdırabı{/d} tattık ve ebediyen değiştik. Doğru, tehlikeli bir rakipsin."

languages.text: {n}Un temblor atraviesa el rostro quemado del hombre.{/n} «No miente. Los dos hemos probado la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}agonía más pura{/d}, quedando marcados por ella. Sí, es un{mf||a} oponente peligros{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: {n}A tremor runs across the man's burned face.{/n} "You are not lying. We have both tasted {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pure agony{/d} and are forever changed by it. Yes, you are a dangerous opponent."

traits.locale_text: {n}Un temblor atraviesa el rostro quemado del hombre.{/n} «No miente. Los dos hemos probado la {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}agonía más pura{/d}, quedando marcados por ella. Sí, es un{mf||a} oponente peligros{mf|o|a}».

languages.text: {n}男人烧毁的脸抽搐起来。{/n}“你说的是实话，我们都品尝过{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}纯粹的痛苦{/d}，也被它彻底改变了。没错，你是个非常危险的对手。”
languages.original_text: {n}A tremor runs across the man's burned face.{/n} "You are not lying. We have both tasted {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pure agony{/d} and are forever changed by it. Yes, you are a dangerous opponent."

traits.locale_text: {n}男人烧毁的脸抽搐起来。{/n}“你说的是实话，我们都品尝过{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}纯粹的痛苦{/d}，也被它彻底改变了。没错，你是个非常危险的对手。”

languages.text: {n}Le visage brûlé de l'homme se tord dans un spasme.{/n} « Vous ne mentez pas. Nous avons tous deux expérimenté l'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}agonie pure{/d} et ne serons plus jamais les mêmes. Oui, vous êtes {mf|un dangereux|une dangereuse} adversaire. »
languages.original_text: {n}A tremor runs across the man's burned face.{/n} "You are not lying. We have both tasted {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}pure agony{/d} and are forever changed by it. Yes, you are a dangerous opponent."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le visage brûlé de l'homme se tord dans un spasme.{/n} « Vous ne mentez pas. Nous avons tous deux expérimenté l'{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_DH_Torture}agonie pure{/d} et ne serons plus jamais les mêmes. Oui, vous êtes {mf|un dangereux|une dangereuse} adversaire. »
